featured.text: This time, the tortoise wins the race because the hare cannot swim.
Dr. Hare, one of the venture’s co-founders, says a dog’s intelligence can’t be described with a single number.
Firstly, the hare carries the tortoise on its back to the river.
The end of the famous fable of “The Tortoise and the Hare” is well known to all: the tortoise wins the race against the hare.

other.text: Then, the tortoise carries the hare and swims to the 38 bank of the river.
At the request of the hare, a second race is 32 and this time, the hare runs without taking a rest and wins.
Then it is the tortoise that 34 the hare to a third race along a different route in which there is a river just before the final destination.
Lastly, the hare carries the tortoise again on its back.

definition.zh_def: 野兔，一種大型的兔子，通常生活在野外，具有長耳朵和強壯的後腿。
definition.en_def: A hare is a large, fast-running mammal similar to a rabbit, typically found in the wild, characterized by long ears and strong hind legs.
definition.example: The hare quickly darted across the field to escape from the predator.
